text:
• Are there docs for Pluto?  So far I've been searching on Github and Google
• Is there a flag for sequential rather than reactive execution?  ...mb this is a heretical question here...

elements.text: Are there docs for Pluto?  So far I've been searching on Github and Google
Is there a flag for sequential rather than reactive execution?  ...mb this is a heretical question here...

text:
Unfortunately, the best way to learn Pluto is through the example notebooks it provides (which are quite good), but there are no docs

On the second point, it is relatively easy to check/force Pluto to do everything sequentially (though very hacky)

text: Why not convert the example notebooks into html and upload them as Pluto docs on GH?
